Posts.Content: wish i'd seen yr message in time to help, cathy75! MRI in my case was because my type didn't image well in other ways. Would have liked to reassure you that MRI is quite painless, but bring your own spongy earplugs and insist on using them as well as their earphones! Water under bridge by now, but might help someone else best xxx
Posts.Title: New to site. Worried about what to expect from My breast MRI
